title: Bush Christmas
creator_credit: Henri Safran, Paul D. Barron, Gilda Baracchi and Barron Films
brief_description: It’s nearly Christmas and a group of children embark on a courageous and exciting adventure to rescue their stolen horse in time to take part in the big country race on New Year’s Day. This timeless story is a wonderful Australian film filled with adventure, comedy and a dash of romance. Stars Nicole Kidman and John Howard.
